main module¶

main.get_run_type(name)¶

Determines the run type of the data processing. :param name: Determines a switch case based on the input file name. Possible options are expect.t, npop.t, table.dat, efield.t, nstate_i.t. :type name: string

Returns

The name of the function to call for the selected case.

Return type

function name

main.main(data_in, dir_in, dir_out, threshd=1e-05)¶

Main function call if analysis package is to be run as a script. :param data_in: Input file name. :type data_in: string :param dir_in: Input file directory. :type dir_in: string :param dir_out: Output file directory. :type dir_out: string :param threshd: The variance threshold below which data is considered as constant and not included in the output. :type threshd: float

main.run_abort(data, threshd)¶
main.run_efield(data, threshd, dir_out)¶

Handles the call to read efield.t data; Fourier-transforms relevant values (values that are not constant) and plots the resulting spectrum. :param data: The data to process. :type data: numpy array :param threshd: The variance threshold below which data is considered as constant and not included in the output. :type threshd: float :param dir_out: Output file directory. :type dir_out: string

main.run_expec(data, threshd, dir_out)¶

Handles the call to read and plot expect.t data; only plots relevant values (values that are not constant). :param data: The data to process. :type data: pandas dataframe :param threshd: The variance threshold below which data is considered as constant and not included in the output. :type threshd: float :param dir_out: Output file directory. :type dir_out: string

main.run_npop(data, threshd, dir_out)¶

Handles the call to read npop.t data; discards irrelevant columns (columns that remain constant); constructs the correlation matrix and prints/plots the result. :param data: The data to process. :type data: pandas dataframe :param threshd: The variance threshold below which data is considered as constant and not included in the output. :type threshd: float :param dir_out: Output file directory. :type dir_out: string

main.run_nstate(data, threshd, dir_out)¶

Handles the call to read nstate_i.t data; calculates, prints and plots the autocorrelation function; Fourier-transforms and plots the autocorrelation function. :param data: The data to process. :type data: numpy array :param threshd: The variance threshold below which data is considered as constant and not included in the output. :type threshd: float :param dir_out: Output file directory. :type dir_out: string

main.run_table(data, threshd, dir_out)¶

Handles the call to read table.dat data; calculates Euclidean distance (L2 norm) of the vectors in the table. :param data: The data to process. :type data: numpy array :param threshd: The variance threshold below which data is considered as constant and not included in the output. :type threshd: float :param dir_out: Output file directory. :type dir_out: string
